```{r libraries}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytransit)
```
# Read GTFS Feed

Use TidyTransit to read LA Metro's GTFS data from: https://gitlab.com/LACMTA/gtfs_rail/raw/master/gtfs_rail.zip?1729758603.3193846

```{r}
la_metro = read_gtfs(here("data", "gtfs_rail.zip"))#"https://gitlab.com/LACMTA/gtfs_rail/raw/master/gtfs_rail.zip")

summary(la_metro)
```

Routes

```{r}
head(la_metro$routes)
```

Stops

```{r}
head(la_metro$stops)
```

Stop Times

```{r}
head(la_metro$stop_times)
```

Trips

```{r}
head(la_metro$trips)
```

```{r}
la_metro_shapes = gtfs_as_sf(la_metro)

summary(la_metro_shapes)
```

```{r}
ggplot(la_metro_shapes$shapes) +
  geom_sf() +
  theme_minimal()
```
```{r}
la_metro_shapes$stops |> glimpse()
```
